apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: my-example-job
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - echo
        - hello
        image: ubuntu:24.04
        name: my-example-job
      restartPolicy: Never
  ttlSecondsAfterFinished: 100

##### FILE: my_sql_DB.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/wordpress-mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: wordpress
  name: wordpress-mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: wordpress
      tier: mysql
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: wordpress
        tier: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: PASSWORDS_IN_PLAIN_TEXT_ARE_BAD_WE_WILL_SHOW_SOMETHING_MORE_SECURE_LATER
        image: mysql:5.6
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pv-claim

---

##### FILE: mysq_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  serviceName: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: mysql-config
        image: public.ecr.aws/cloudacademy-labs/cloudacademy/labs/k8s-assessment/mysql:8
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /tmp/mysql/
          type: Directory
        name: mysql

---

##### FILE: mysql_backup_cronjob.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/CronJob/mysql-backup:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: mysql-backup
  namespace: default
spec:
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        spec:
          containers:
          - args:
            - /bin/sh
            - -c
            - mysqldump -hmysql.default -uroot -ptest123 --all-databases > "/var/tmp/mysql_backup.$(date
              %!F(MISSING)_%!R(MISSING)).sql"
            image: mysql:5.6
            name: mysqlbackup
            volumeMounts:
            - mountPath: /var/tmp
              name: dbbackup
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
          volumes:
          - name: dbbackup
            nfs:
              path: /var/backup
              server: << NFS Server >>
  schedule: '*/5 * * * *'

---

##### FILE: mysql_dep.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mysql
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
      tier: database
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
        tier: database
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_USER
              name: configmap
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_DATABASE
              name: configmap
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_PASSWORD
              name: secret-petclinic
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
              name: secret-petclinic
        image: mysql:8.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 3306
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pv-claim

---

##### FILE: mysql_deploy_and_serve_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/fastapi-mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: fastapi-server
  name: fastapi-mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: fastapi-server
      tier: mysql
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: fastapi-server
        tier: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-pass
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: fastapi
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: fastapi_user
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-pass
        image: mysql:8.0
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pv-claim

---

      - name: my-volume

          claimName: my-pvc

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_HOST
          value: '%!'(MISSING)
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: password
        image: mysql:5.6
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pv-claim

---

##### FILE: mysql_deployment1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql-deploy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    name: mysql-deploy
  name: mysql-deploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: mysql-pod
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: mysql-pod
      name: mysql-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-admin-password
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-root-password
              name: mysql-secret
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: database-configmap
        image: mysql:5.7
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pv-claim

---

##### FILE: mysql_deployment2_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_HOST
          value: '%!'(MISSING)
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: password
        image: mysql:5.6
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pv-claim

---

##### FILE: mysql_deployment3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_PASSWORD
              name: ghostdbsecrets
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: alex
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_PASSWORD
              name: ghostdbsecrets
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: ghostdb
        image: mysql:latest
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-data
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-data

---

##### FILE: mysql_deployment9.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql-deploy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    name: mysql-deploy
  name: mysql-deploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: mysql-pod
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: mysql-pod
      name: mysql-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-admin-password
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-root-password
              name: mysql-secret
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: database-configmap
        image: mysql:5.7
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pv-claim

---

##### FILE: mysql_editor_role.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ClusterRole/mysql-editor-role:
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRole
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: gobackup-operator
  name: mysql-editor-role
  namespace: default
rules:
- apiGroups:
  - gobackup.io
  resources:
  - mysqls
  verbs:
  - create
  - delete
  - get
  - list
  - patch
  - update
  - watch
- apiGroups:
  - gobackup.io
  resources:
  - mysqls/status
  verbs:
  - get

##### FILE: mysql_job-dataseed.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/my-sql-dump:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: my-sql-dump
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      name: my-sql-dump
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - bash
        - -c
        - |
          git clone https://github.com/DeekshithSN/kubernetes.git
          mysql -h mysql -u root -padmin -e 'CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS test';
          mysql -h mysql -u root -padmin test < kubernetes/datadump/mysql.sql
          sleep 20
        image: jlsrly/mysql-git
        name: my-sql-seed
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
  ttlSecondsAfterFinished: 10

---

##### FILE: mysql_password_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --ignore-db-dir=lost+found
        env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql_root_passwd
              name: mysqldb-secret
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_HOST
          value: '%!'(MISSING)
        image: mysql:5.7
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /mysql_data
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: mysql-persistent-storage

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to mysql/Deployment/mysql-query:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql-query
  namespace: mysql
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql-query
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql-query
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_DSN
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DSN
              name: tidb-config
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: USER
              name: tidb-config
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: PASSWORD
              name: tidb-config
        image: xiang13225080/mysqldemo:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: mysql-query
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8001

##### FILE: mysql_statfulset3_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/web:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: web
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  serviceName: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: k8s.gcr.io/nginx-slim:0.8
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: web
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: www
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: www
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi
      storageClassName: manual

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/StatefulSet/web

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/StatefulSet/web

##### FILE: mysql56.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mysql
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql
        image: mysql:5.6
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 0.1
          requests:
            memory: 400Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-volumeclaim

---

##### FILE: mysql60.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mysql
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  serviceName: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD_FILE
          value: /var/run/secrets/mysql/root_password
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: taskapp
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: taskapp_user
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD_FILE
          value: /var/run/secrets/mysql/user_password
        image: ghcr.io/gihyodocker/taskapp-mysql:v0.1.0
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-data
        - mountPath: /var/run/secrets/mysql
          name: mysql-secret
          readOnly: true
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-secret
        secret:
          secretName: mysql
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mysql-data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

---

  serviceName: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD_FILE
          value: /var/run/secrets/mysql/root_password
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: taskapp
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: taskapp_user
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD_FILE
          value: /var/run/secrets/mysql/user_password
        image: ghcr.io/gihyodocker/taskapp-mysql:v0.1.0
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-data
        - mountPath: /var/run/secrets/mysql
          name: mysql-secret
          readOnly: true
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-secret
        secret:
          secretName: mysql
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mysql-data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to taskapp/StatefulSet/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mysql
  name: mysql
  namespace: taskapp
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  serviceName: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD_FILE
          value: /var/run/secrets/mysql/root_password
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: taskapp
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: taskapp_user
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD_FILE
          value: /var/run/secrets/mysql/user_password
        image: ghcr.io/gihyodocker/taskapp-mysql:v1.0.0
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 100Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-data
        - mountPath: /var/run/secrets/mysql
          name: mysql-secret
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-secret
        secret:
          secretName: mysql
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mysql-data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

##### FILE: mysql7_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 10
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  serviceName: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_DATABASE
              name: dados
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DB_PASSWORD
              name: senhas
        image: mysql:8
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-ps
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-ps
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: volume-mysql

---

    app: mysql
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --default-authentication-plugin=mysql_native_password
        env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql
        image: mysql:8
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-volumeclaim

##### FILE: mysql78.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/init-db-sql:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  init_db.sql: "DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS crawl_data;\nCREATE DATABASE crawl_data default
    CHARACTER SET UTF8;\nUSE crawl_data;\nDROP TABLE IF EXISTS post;\nDROP TABLE IF
    EXISTS domain;\nCREATE TABLE domain(\n    id BIGINT NOT NULL UNIQUE PRIMARY KEY,\n
    \   url VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL\n);\nCREATE TABLE post(\n    id BIGINT NOT NULL,\n
    \   url VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,\n    title VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,\n    date BIGINT,\n
    \   PRIMARY KEY(id, url),\n    FOREIGN KEY(id) \n    REFERENCES domain(id) ON
    UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE\n);\n"
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: init-db-sql
  namespace: default

---

##### FILE: mysql78_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: "1234"
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: crawl_data
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: user
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          value: "1234"
        image: mysql:8
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - mysqladmin
            - ping
            - -h
            - 127.0.0.1
            - -u
            - root
            - --password=1234
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: mysql
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - mysqladmin
            - ping
            - -h
            - 127.0.0.1
            - -u
            - root
            - --password=1234
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
          name: mysql-initdb
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-data
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: init-db-sql
        name: mysql-initdb
      - hostPath:
          path: /run/desktop/mnt/host/c/Users/hyeneung/k8s-app-data/db/data
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: mysql-data

---

##### FILE: mysql80.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to namespace-project/Deployment/mysql-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: wordpress
  name: mysql-deployment
  namespace: namespace-project
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: wordpress
      tier: mysql
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: wordpress
        tier: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-password
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: wordpress
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: wordpress
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-password
        image: mysql:8.0
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-pvc
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-pvc
        persistentVolumeClaim:

  template:

      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:

          value: employees_db
        image: mysql:latest
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306

          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: mysql-persistent-storage

##### FILE: mysql83.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 30
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  serviceName: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_DATABASE
              name: dados
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DB_PASSWORD
              name: senhas
        image: mysql:8
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - mysqladmin
            - -uroot
            - -p$MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
            - ping
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-ps
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-ps
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: volume-mysql

---

##### FILE: mysql87.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mysql
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  serviceName: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
              - key: node-role.kubernetes.io/edge
                operator: DoesNotExist
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: HTTP_PORT
          value: "80"
        - name: HTTPS_PORT
          value: "443"
        image: fabedge/net-tool:v0.1.0
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP

---

##### FILE: mysql89.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/mysql:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  labels:
    name: mysql
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - args:
    - --ignore-db-dir
    - lost+found
    env:
    - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
      value: yourpassword
    image: mysql
    name: mysql
    ports:
    - containerPort: 3306
      name: mysql
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 0.5
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
      name: mysql-persistent-storage
  volumes:
  - cinder:
      fsType: ext4

kind: Deployment

    app: mysql
  name: mysql-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-password
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_HOST
          value: mysql-service
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-user
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-password
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: mysql-database
              name: mysql-config
        image: mysql:5.7
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306

  replicas: 1

      app: mysql
  serviceName: mysql
  template:

      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:

            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_DATABASE
              name: dados
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DB_PASSWORD
              name: senhas
        image: mysql:8
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-ps
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-ps
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: volume-mysql

                  name: senhas

            name: mysqldump
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
  schedule: 0 3 * * *

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mysql
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-password
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: mysql-database
              name: mysql-config
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-user
              name: mysql-secret
        image: mysql:5.7
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pvc

##### FILE: mysqldb_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mysql-statefulset:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mysql-statefulset
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  serviceName: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: your_database
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-secret
        image: mysql:latest
        name: mysql-service
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: db-port
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-storage
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mysql-storage
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

---

##### FILE: mysqlstatefulset.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/mydb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mydb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  serviceName: mysql-svc
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --ignore-db-dir=lost+found
        env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: rootpass
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_HOST
          value: '%!'(MISSING)
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: dbname
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: userpass
              name: mysql-secret
        image: grovince/test:db_v12
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: tpc
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: data
        - mountPath: /etc/mysql/conf.d
          name: conf
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: mysql-cnf
        name: conf
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi
      storageClassName: gp2

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to exam/StatefulSet/mysql-statefulset:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mysql-statefulset
  namespace: exam
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  serviceName: mysql-service
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: testdb
        image: mysql:latest
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - cat
            - /tmp/healthy
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: db-port
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - cat
            - /tmp/healthy
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 5
        startupProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - touch
            - /tmp/healthy
          failureThreshold: 30
          periodSeconds: 5
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-data
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: mysql-data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

    server.rootdse.weight=0
    server.rootdse.dse.className=net.sourceforge.myvd.inserts.RootDSE
    server.rootdse.dse.config.namingContexts=o=Tremolo
    server.myvdroot.chain=root
    server.myvdroot.nameSpace=o=Tremolo
    server.myvdroot.weight=0
    server.myvdroot.root.className=net.sourceforge.myvd.inserts.RootObject

    server.shadowUsers.mapping.className=net.sourceforge.myvd.inserts.mapping.AttributeMapper
    server.shadowUsers.mapping.config.mapping=mail=email,givenName=first_name,sn=last_name
    server.shadowUsers.api.className=com.tremolosecurity.myvd.K8sCrdInsert
    server.shadowUsers.api.config.alwaysMapUIDInFilter=true
    server.shadowUsers.api.config.nameSpace=#[K8S_OPENUNISON_NS:openunison]
    server.shadowUsers.api.config.k8sTargetName=k8s
    server.shadowUsers.api.config.alwaysMapUIDInFilter=true

    server.activedirectory.chain=objectguid2text,dnmapper,memberofmapper,memberof,objmap,membertrans,ldap
    server.activedirectory.nameSpace=ou=activedirectory,o=Data
    server.activedirectory.weight=0
    server.activedirectory.enabled=true
    server.activedirectory.objectguid2text.className=com.tremolosecurity.proxy.myvd.inserts.util.UUIDtoText
    server.activedirectory.objectguid2text.config.attributeName=objectGUID

##### FILE: myVolume-v3.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/myvolumes-pod:

kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: myvolumes-pod
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - echo The Bench Container 1 is Running ; sleep 3600
    image: alpine
    imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
    name: myvolumes-container-1
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /demo1
      name: demo-volume
  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - echo The Bench Container 2 is Running ; sleep 3600
    image: alpine
    imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
    name: myvolumes-container-2
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /demo2
      name: demo-volume
  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - echo The Bench Container 3 is Running ; sleep 3600
    image: alpine
    imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
    name: myvolumes-container-3
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /demo3
      name: demo-volume
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: demo-volume

apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRole

    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: dynamic-watch
  name: mywatchere-editor-role
  namespace: default

- apiGroups:
  - core.mydomain.com
  resources:
  - mywatcheres
  verbs:
  - create
  - delete
  - get
  - list
  - patch
  - update

##### FILE: myweb4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/webapp-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: webapp
  name: webapp-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: webapp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: webapp
        app.kubernetes.io/name: myweb
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 3
        name: webapp
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            memory: 300Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html/
          name: nginx-index-file
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: index-html-configmap
        name: nginx-index-file

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/webapp-deployment

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Deployment/webapp-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule autogen-require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/webapp-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/webapp-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/requests/cpu/

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/myweb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    app: myweb
  name: myweb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: myweb
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        app: myweb
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: cmvol
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: myindex
        name: cmvol
status: {}

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/myweb-pod:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  labels:
    app: myweb
  name: myweb-pod
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - args:
    - tail
    - -f
    - /dev/null
    image: alpine
    name: web-source
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /source
      name: source-volume
  - image: nginx:1.25.3-alpine
    name: webserver
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html/
      name: source-volume
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: source-volume

---

##### FILE: mywebserver_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/HorizontalPodAutoscaler/mywebsite:
apiVersion: autoscaling/v2
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
metadata:
  name: mywebsite
  namespace: default
spec:
  maxReplicas: 4
  metrics:
  - resource:
      name: cpu
      target:
        averageUtilization: 70
        type: Utilization
    type: Resource
  - resource:
      name: memory
      target:
        averageUtilization: 80
        type: Utilization
    type: Resource
  minReplicas: 2
  scaleTargetRef:
    apiVersion: apps/v1
    kind: Deployment
    name: myapp-autoscaling

---

  name: n8n-secret

##### FILE: n8n2_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to science/Deployment/n8n:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: n8n
  namespace: science
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: n8n
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: n8n
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: n8n-secret
        image: docker.n8n.io/n8nio/n8n
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: n8n
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5678
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/n8n:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: n8n
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: n8n
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: n8n
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TZ
          value: America/Montreal
        - name: N8N_BASIC_AUTH_ACTIVE
          value: "true"
        - name: N8N_PORT
          value: "5678"
        - name: N8N_PROTOCOL
          value: https
        - name: NODE_ENV
          value: production
        - name: WEBHOOK_URL
          value: https://n8n.btrcloud.com/
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: n8n-secret
        image: docker.n8n.io/n8nio/n8n:1.83.2
        name: n8n
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5678
          name: http
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 300m
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 250Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsGroup: 1000
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 1000
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /home/node
          name: data
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - mkdir -p /data/.cache /data/.n8n && chown -R 1000:1000 /data && chmod 600
          /data/.n8n/config || true
        image: busybox:1.37
        name: volume-permissions
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: data
      volumes:
      - name: data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: n8n-pvc

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to n8n/ConfigMap/postgres-init:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  postgres-init.sh: "#!/bin/bash\nset -e;\nif [ -n \"${POSTGRES_NON_ROOT_USER:-}\"
    ] && [ -n \"${POSTGRES_NON_ROOT_PASSWORD:-}\" ]; then\n\tpsql -v ON_ERROR_STOP=1
    --username \"$POSTGRES_USER\" --dbname \"$POSTGRES_DB\" <<-EOSQL\n\t\tCREATE USER
    \"${POSTGRES_NON_ROOT_USER}\" WITH PASSWORD '${POSTGRES_NON_ROOT_PASSWORD}';\n\t\tGRANT
    ALL PRIVILEGES ON DATABASE ${POSTGRES_DB} TO \"${POSTGRES_NON_ROOT_USER}\";\n\tEOSQL\nelse\n\techo
    \"SETUP INFO: No Environment variables given!\"\nfi\n"
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: postgres-init
  namespace: n8n

##### FILE: n8n-deployment_8.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to n8n/Deployment/n8n:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    service: n8n
  name: n8n
  namespace: n8n
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      service: n8n
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        service: n8n
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - sleep 5; n8n start
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        env:
        - name: DB_TYPE
          value: postgresdb
        - name: DB_POSTGRESDB_HOST
          value: postgres-service.n8n.svc.cluster.local
        - name: DB_POSTGRESDB_PORT
          value: "5432"
        - name: DB_POSTGRESDB_DATABASE
          value: n8n
        - name: DB_POSTGRESDB_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_NON_ROOT_USER
              name: postgres-secret
        - name: DB_POSTGRESDB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_NON_ROOT_PASSWORD
              name: postgres-secret
        - name: N8N_PROTOCOL
          value: http
        - name: N8N_PORT
          value: "5678"
        image: aliaktas/n8n:1.27.1
        name: n8n
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5678
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            memory: 250Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /home/node/.n8n
          name: n8n-data
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - chown 1000:1000 /data
        image: busybox:1.36
        name: volume-permissions
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: n8n-data
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: n8n-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: n8n-data
      - name: n8n-secret
        secret:
          secretName: n8n-secret
      - name: postgres-secret
        secret:
          secretName: postgres-secret

---

##### FILE: n8n-deployment_9.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to n8n/Deployment/postgres:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    service: postgres-n8n
  name: postgres
  namespace: n8n
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      service: postgres-n8n
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        service: postgres-n8n
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PGDATA
          value: /var/lib/postgresql/data/pgdata
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_USER
              name: postgres-secret
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
              name: postgres-secret
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          value: n8n
        - name: POSTGRES_NON_ROOT_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_NON_ROOT_USER
              name: postgres-secret
        - name: POSTGRES_NON_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_NON_ROOT_PASSWORD
              name: postgres-secret
        - name: POSTGRES_HOST
          value: postgres-service
        - name: POSTGRES_PORT
          value: "5432"
        image: postgres:11
        name: postgres
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "4"
            memory: 4Gi
          requests:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 2Gi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: postgres-data
        - mountPath: /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/init-n8n-user.sh
          name: postgres-init
          subPath: postgres-init.sh
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: postgres-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: postgres-data
      - name: postgres-secret
        secret:
          secretName: postgres-secret
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 484
          name: postgres-init
        name: postgres-init

---

##### FILE: n8n-deployment1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to n8n/Deployment/n8n:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    service: n8n
  name: n8n
  namespace: n8n
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      service: n8n
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        service: n8n
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - sleep 5; n8n start
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        env:
        - name: N8N_METRICS
          value: "true"
        - name: DB_TYPE
          value: postgresdb
        - name: DB_POSTGRESDB_HOST
          value: postgres.postgres.svc.calfolguera.com
        - name: DB_POSTGRESDB_PORT
          value: "5432"
        - name: DB_POSTGRESDB_DATABASE
          value: n8n
        - name: DB_POSTGRESDB_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_NON_ROOT_USER
              name: postgres-secret
        - name: DB_POSTGRESDB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_NON_ROOT_PASSWORD
              name: postgres-secret
        - name: N8N_PROTOCOL
          value: http
        - name: N8N_PORT
          value: "5678"
        image: n8nio/n8n:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: n8n
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5678
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            memory: 250Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /home/node/.n8n
          name: n8n-claim0
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - chown 1000:1000 /data
        image: busybox:1.36
        name: volume-permissions
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: n8n-claim0
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: n8n-claim0
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: n8n-claim0
      - name: n8n-secret
        secret:
          secretName: n8n-secret
      - name: postgres-secret
        secret:
          secretName: postgres-secret

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    service: n8n

        - /bin/sh

          value: postgresdb
        - name: DB_POSTGRESDB_HOST
          value: postgres-service.n8n.svc.cluster.local
        - name: DB_POSTGRESDB_PORT
          value: "5432"

              key: POSTGRES_NON_ROOT_PASSWORD

          claimName: n8n-claim0

##### FILE: nachet-ingress.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to nachet/Ingress/nachet-backend-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    cert-manager.io/cluster-issuer: letsencrypt-prod
    external-dns.alpha.kubernetes.io/target: inspection.alpha.canada.ca
    kubernetes.io/tls-acme: "true"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/auth-signin: https://vouch.inspection.alpha.canada.ca/login?url=$scheme://$http_host$request_uri&vouch-failcount=$auth_resp_failcount&X-Vouch-Token=$auth_resp_jwt&error=$auth_resp_err
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/auth-snippet: |
      # these return values are used by the @error401 call
      auth_request_set $auth_resp_jwt $upstream_http_x_vouch_jwt;
      auth_request_set $auth_resp_err $upstream_http_x_vouch_err;
      auth_request_set $auth_resp_failcount $upstream_http_x_vouch_failcount;
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/auth-url: https://vouch.inspection.alpha.canada.ca/validate
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/client_max_body_size: 200m
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/custom-http-errors: "403"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/default-backend: default-nginx-backend
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/proxy-read-timeout: "120"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /$2
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/use-regex: "true"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/whitelist-source-range: 205.194.32.0/24,10.244.0.0/16,192.197.71.0/24
  name: nachet-backend-ingress
  namespace: nachet
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: nachet.inspection.alpha.canada.ca
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: nachet-backend-svc
            port:
              number: 8080
        path: /api(/|$)(.*)
        pathType: ImplementationSpecific
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - nachet.inspection.alpha.canada.ca
    secretName: aciacfia-tls

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 1, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to nachet/Ingress/nachet-frontend-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    cert-manager.io/cluster-issuer: letsencrypt-prod
    external-dns.alpha.kubernetes.io/target: inspection.alpha.canada.ca
    kubernetes.io/tls-acme: "true"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/add-base-url: "true"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/auth-signin: https://vouch.inspection.alpha.canada.ca/login?url=$scheme://$http_host$request_uri&vouch-failcount=$auth_resp_failcount&X-Vouch-Token=$auth_resp_jwt&error=$auth_resp_err
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/auth-snippet: |
      # these return values are used by the @error401 call
      auth_request_set $auth_resp_jwt $upstream_http_x_vouch_jwt;
      auth_request_set $auth_resp_err $upstream_http_x_vouch_err;
      auth_request_set $auth_resp_failcount $upstream_http_x_vouch_failcount;
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/auth-url: https://vouch.inspection.alpha.canada.ca/validate
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/client_max_body_size: 200m
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/custom-http-errors: "403"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/default-backend: default-nginx-backend
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/proxy-read-timeout: "120"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/whitelist-source-range: 205.194.32.0/24,10.244.0.0/16,192.197.71.0/24
  name: nachet-frontend-ingress
  namespace: nachet
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: nachet.inspection.alpha.canada.ca
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: nachet-frontend-svc
            port:
              number: 3000
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - nachet.inspection.alpha.canada.ca
    secretName: aciacfia-tls

---

    secretName: aciacfia-tls

##### FILE: nachet-rcnn-model-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to nachet/Deployment/nachet-rcnn-detector:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nachet-rcnn-detector
  namespace: nachet
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nachet-rcnn-detector
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: nachet-rcnn-detector
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.azure.com/role
                operator: In
                values:
                - agent
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - nachet-rcnn-detector
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - args:
        - ./startup.sh
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: nachet-rcnn-detector-secrets
        image: ghcr.io/ai-cfia/nachet-backend:29-azureml-seed-detector
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 5001
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: nachet-rcnn-detector
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5001
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "2"
            memory: 6Gi
          requests:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 4Gi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
          runAsGroup: 1000
          runAsNonRoot: false
          runAsUser: 1000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/logs
          name: logs
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: tmp
      volumes:
      - emptyDir:
          medium: Memory
          sizeLimit: 500Mi
        name: tmp
      - emptyDir:
          medium: Memory
          sizeLimit: 500Mi
        name: logs

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to nachet/Deployment/nachet-swin-classifier-22-spp:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nachet-swin-classifier-22-spp
  namespace: nachet
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nachet-swin-classifier-22-spp
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: nachet-swin-classifier-22-spp
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.azure.com/role
                operator: In
                values:
                - agent
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - nachet-swin-classifier-22-spp
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - args:
        - azmlinfsrv --entry_script /app/score.py
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: nachet-swin-classifier-secrets
        image: ghcr.io/ai-cfia/nachet-backend:29-azureml-swin-classifier-22-spp
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 5001
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: nachet-swin-classifier-22-spp
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5001
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 2Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 1Gi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
          runAsGroup: 1000
          runAsNonRoot: false
          runAsUser: 1000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/logs
          name: logs
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: tmp
      volumes:
      - emptyDir:
          medium: Memory
          sizeLimit: 500Mi
        name: tmp
      - emptyDir:
          medium: Memory
          sizeLimit: 500Mi
        name: logs

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to nachet/Deployment/nachet-swin-classifier-27-spp:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nachet-swin-classifier-27-spp
  namespace: nachet
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nachet-swin-classifier-27-spp
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nachet-swin-classifier-27-spp
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.azure.com/role
                operator: In
                values:
                - agent
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - nachet-swin-classifier-27-spp
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: nachet-swin-classifier-secrets
        image: ghcr.io/ai-cfia/nachet-model-ccds/gpu-classifier-27spp-model-1:2025030321
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: nachet-swin-classifier-27-spp
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 3500m
            memory: 15Gi
          requests:
            cpu: "3"
            memory: 12Gi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
          runAsGroup: 1000
          runAsNonRoot: false
          runAsUser: 1000

---

##### FILE: nachet-swin-model-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to nachet/Deployment/nachet-swin-classifier:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nachet-swin-classifier
  namespace: nachet
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nachet-swin-classifier
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: nachet-swin-classifier
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.azure.com/role
                operator: In
                values:
                - agent
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - nachet-swin-classifier
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - args:
        - ./startup.sh
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: nachet-swin-classifier-secrets
        image: ghcr.io/ai-cfia/nachet-backend:29-azureml-swin-classifier
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 5001
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: nachet-swin-classifier
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5001
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 2Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 1Gi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
          runAsGroup: 1000
          runAsNonRoot: false
          runAsUser: 1000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/logs
          name: logs
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: tmp
      volumes:
      - emptyDir:
          medium: Memory
          sizeLimit: 500Mi
        name: tmp
      - emptyDir:
          medium: Memory
          sizeLimit: 500Mi
        name: logs

---


Mutation:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to nachet/Deployment/nachet-swin-classifier:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nachet-swin-classifier
  namespace: nachet
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nachet-swin-classifier
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: nachet-swin-classifier
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.azure.com/role
                operator: In
                values:
                - agent
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - nachet-swin-classifier
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - args:
        - ./startup.sh
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: nachet-swin-classifier-secrets
        image: ghcr.io/ai-cfia/nachet-backend:29-azureml-swin-classifier
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 5001
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: nachet-swin-classifier
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5001
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 2Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 1Gi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
          runAsGroup: 1000
          runAsNonRoot: false
          runAsUser: 1000
        volumeMounts:

          name: logs
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: tmp
      volumes:
      - emptyDir:
          medium: Memory
          sizeLimit: 500Mi
        name: tmp
      - emptyDir:
          medium: Memory
          sizeLimit: 500Mi
        name: logs

##### FILE: nacos_component-render_manifest.golden.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to dubbo-system/StatefulSet/nacos:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: nacos
  namespace: dubbo-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: nacos
  serviceName: nacos
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: nacos
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NACOS_SERVER_PORT
          value: "8848"
        - name: NACOS_APPLICATION_PORT
          value: "8848"
        - name: PREFER_HOST_MODE
          value: "8848"
        - name: MODE
          value: standalone
        - name: EMBEDDED_STORAGE
          value: embedded
        image: nacos/nacos-cp-server:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /nacos/v1/console/health/liveness
            port: 8848
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        name: nacos
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8848
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9848
          name: clientgen-rpc
        - containerPort: 9849
          name: raft-rpc
        - containerPort: 7848
          name: old-raft-rpc
        resources:
          limits: {}
          requests: {}
        startupProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /nacos/v1/console/health/readiness
            port: 8848
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 180
          periodSeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /home/nacos/plugins/peer-finder
          name: data
          subPath: peer-finder
        - mountPath: /home/nacos/data
          name: data
          subPath: data
        - mountPath: /home/nacos/logs
          name: data
          subPath: logs
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: data

---

    targetPort: 7848

##### FILE: nagp-ms-api-deployment.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/api-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: api-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: api
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SPRING_DATA_MONGODB_URI
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: SPRING_DATA_MONGODB_URI
              name: api-config
        image: mayanksnagp2024/mks_nagp:v2
        name: api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 800m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 256Mi

##### FILE: namenode-statefulset.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/namenode:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: namenode
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: namenode
  serviceName: namenode-svc
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: namenode
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /opt/starter.sh
        - hdfs
        - namenode
        env:
        - name: ENSURE_NAMENODE_DIR
          value: /data/dfs/name
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: hadoop-conf
        image: apache/hadoop:3.3.6
        name: namenode
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8020
          name: rpc
        - containerPort: 9870
          name: http
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: namenode-pvc
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: namenode-pvc
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 128Mi
      storageClassName: namenode-storage

---

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""

  namespace: capi-kubeadm-control-plane-system

  egress:
  - ports:

apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""

  name: allow-dns
  namespace: cert-manager

      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/monitoring:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}

metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/kube-system:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: kube-system

  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: cdash
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.

apiVersion: v1

    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota

kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: vaultwarden
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/vaultwarden:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: vaultwarden
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/vaultwarden:
apiVersion: v1
kind: LimitRange
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: vaultwarden
spec:
  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: development
spec:
  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

##### FILE: namespace-example.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/NetworkPolicy/egress-namespaces:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: egress-namespaces
  namespace: default
spec:
  egress:
  - to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchExpressions:
        - key: namespace
          operator: In
          values:
          - frontend
          - backend
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app: myapp
  policyTypes:
  - Egress
